prod_desc: Stop the Goblin King’s evil plan and rescue Emily Jones’ sister!
prod_long_desc:
Join the exciting adventures in Elvendale as Emily Jones sneaks into the Goblin King’s Fortress to save her sister, Sophie Jones. This set includes Emily’s raft with a grappling hook and movable rudder, plus the fortress with a lowering drawbridge, secret door behind the crystals, firing catapult, revolving throne and a dangling cage over snapping plants. Includes 3 mini-doll figures plus goblin and shadow raven figures.
Help Emily Jones save her sister and build the fortress of the Goblin King, which includes a lowering drawbridge, secret door behind the crystals and firing catapult!
Includes 3 mini-doll figures: the Golbin King, Emily Jones and Sophie Jones, plus Tufflin the Goblin and shadow raven figures
LEGO Elves building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Goblin King’s Fortress measures over 7” high, 11” wide and 5” long
695 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 8 and 12
set_name: Breakout from the Goblin King's Fortress
